      public static volatile PlayerShipBoard_Page_Lev2_Controller currentController
      A static volatile variable representing the current instance of PlayerShipBoard_Page_Lev2_Controller associated with this class. This variable is used to globally keep track of the active controller instance in a thread-safe manner.

    • setEllipseImage

      public void setEllipseImage(int index, String imagePath)
      Sets the image for an ellipse at the specified index using the provided image path. If the index is within the valid range (0 to 23) and the image loading is successful, the ellipse image will be updated and made visible. If an error occurs while loading the image, an error message will be printed to the console.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the ellipse to update. Must be between 0 and 23 inclusive.
      imagePath - The path to the image resource to be set for the specified ellipse.

    • setEllipseImage

      public void setEllipseImage(int index, javafx.scene.image.Image image)
      Sets the image for an ellipse at the specified index and makes it visible.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the ellipse image to be updated; must be between 0 and 23 (inclusive)
      image - the new image to set for the specified ellipse

    • hideEllipseImage

      public void hideEllipseImage(int index)
      Hides the ellipse image at the specified index by setting its visibility to false and its image to null.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the ellipse image to hide, must be between 0 (inclusive) and 23 (inclusive) and correspond to a non-null ellipse image.

    • showEllipseImage

      public void showEllipseImage(int index)
      Displays an ellipse image at the specified index if it exists and is not null.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the ellipse image to be displayed. Must be between 0 and 23 (inclusive).

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the controller with the specified location and resources. Sets up the background video bindings, buttons, and animated images. Configures the animation container and adjusts the stage properties. Applies the stylesheet to the root scene.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • setButtonImage

      public void setButtonImage()
      Sets the image for multiple button components in the user interface. The method assigns a predefined image resource located at "/it/polimi/ingsw/graphics/cards/cardBackLev2.jpg" to several button elements. The image is retrieved using the class's resource stream, and its presence is ensured using Objects.requireNonNull. If the image resource is missing, a NullPointerException will be thrown. This method updates the following button components with the same image: - buttonImage1 - buttonImage2 - buttonImage3 - buttonImage11

    • someonePickedLittleDeck

      public void someonePickedLittleDeck(Deck d, Player player) throws Exception
      Handles the event when a player has picked a small deck of cards. It verifies the player's identity, checks the deck size, and triggers the loading and animation of the deck's images.
      Specified by:
      someonePickedLittleDeck in interface GeneralView
      Parameters:
      d - the deck selected by the player. It must be non-null and contain exactly three cards.
      player - the player who picked the deck. The player's username must match the one associated with this instance.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the processing of the deck or image loading.

    • removeTileFlipped

      public void removeTileFlipped(int t) throws Exception
      Removes a flipped tile identified by the given tile ID. Delegates the operation to the corresponding player controller, if available.
      Specified by:
      removeTileFlipped in interface GeneralView
      Parameters:
